import Mathlib

open Matrix Function Real Topology Filter

/--
Prove that, for any two bounded functions $g_1, g_2: \RR \to [1, \infty)$, there exist functions $h_1, h_2: \RR \to \RR$ such that, for every $x \in \RR$, \[ \sup_{s \in \RR} (g_1(s)^x g_2(s))  = \max_{t \in \RR} (x h_1(t) + h_2(t)).\]
-/
theorem putnam_2012_b5
(g1 g2 : ℝ → ℝ)
(hgim : ∀ x : ℝ, g1 x ≥ 1 ∧ g2 x ≥ 1)
(hgbd : ∃ B1 B2 : ℝ, ∀ x : ℝ, g1 x ≤ B1 ∧ g2 x ≤ B2)
: ∃ h1 h2 : ℝ → ℝ, ∀ x : ℝ, sSup {((g1 s)^x * (g2 s)) | s : ℝ} = sSup {(x * (h1 t) + h2 t) | t : ℝ} :=
sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_2012_b5
(g1 g2 : ℝ → ℝ)
(hgim : ∀ x : ℝ, g1 x ≥ 1 ∧ g2 x ≥ 1)
(hgbd : ∃ B1 B2 : ℝ, ∀ x : ℝ, g1 x ≤ B1 ∧ g2 x ≤ B2)
: ∃ h1 h2 : ℝ → ℝ, ∀ x : ℝ, sSup {((g1 s)^x * (g2 s)) | s : ℝ} = sSup {(x * (h1 t) + h2 t) | t : ℝ} := by
  use fun x => 0, fun x => 0
  intro x
  have h1 : ∀ x : ℝ, g1 x ≥ 1 := fun x => (hgim x).1
  have h2 : ∀ x : ℝ, g2 x ≥ 1 := fun x => (hgim x).2
  have h3 : ∃ B1 B2 : ℝ, ∀ x : ℝ, g1 x ≤ B1 ∧ g2 x ≤ B2 := hgbd
  have h4 : ∀ x : ℝ, sSup {((g1 s)^x * (g2 s)) | s : ℝ} = sSup {(x * (0 : ℝ) + 0) | t : ℝ} := by
    intro x
    have h5 : ∀ s : ℝ, (g1 s)^x * (g2 s) ≥ 1^x * 1 := by
      intro s
      gcongr <;> nlinarith [h1 s, h2 s]
    have h6 : sSup {((g1 s)^x * (g2 s)) | s : ℝ} ≥ sSup {(x * (0 : ℝ) + 0) | t : ℝ} := by
      apply sSup_mono
      intro y hy
      simp_all [Set.mem_setOf_eq]
      <;>
        (try
          {
            use 0
            simp_all [Set.mem_setOf_eq]
            <;>
              nlinarith [h5 0]
          })
      <;>
        (try
          {
            use x
            simp_all [Set.mem_setOf_eq]
            <;>
              nlinarith [h5 x]
          })
    have h7 : sSup {(x * (0 : ℝ) + 0) | t : ℝ} ≥ sSup {((g1 s)^x * (g2 s)) | s : ℝ} := by
      apply sSup_mono
      intro y hy
      simp_all [Set.mem_setOf_eq]
      <;>
        (try
          {
            use 0
            simp_all [Set.mem_setOf_eq]
            <;>
              nlinarith [h5 0]
          })
      <;>
        (try
          {
            use x
            simp_all [Set.mem_setOf_eq]
            <;>
              nlinarith [h5 x]
          })
    linarith
  simp_all
```

theorem putnam_2012_b5
(g1 g2 : ℝ → ℝ)
(hgim : ∀ x : ℝ, g1 x ≥ 1 ∧ g2 x ≥ 1)
(hgbd : ∃ B1 B2 : ℝ, ∀ x : ℝ, g1 x ≤ B1 ∧ g2 x ≤ B2)
: ∃ h1 h2 : ℝ → ℝ, ∀ x : ℝ, sSup {((g1 s)^x * (g2 s)) | s : ℝ} = sSup {(x * (h1 t) + h2 t) | t : ℝ} := by

  have h1 : ∀ x : ℝ, sSup {((g1 s)^x * (g2 s)) | s : ℝ} = sSup {(x * (0 : ℝ) + 0) | t : ℝ} := by
    intro x
    have h2 : {((g1 s)^x * (g2 s)) | s : ℝ} = {(x * (0 : ℝ) + 0) | t : ℝ} := by
      ext y
      simp only [Set.mem_setOf_eq, Set.mem_singleton_iff]
      constructor
      · rintro ⟨s, rfl⟩
        have h3 : g1 s ≥ 1 := (hgim s).1
        have h4 : g2 s ≥ 1 := (hgim s).2

        simp at h5 ⊢

        use 0
        simp
    rw [h2]
  exact h1 x

theorem putnam_2012_b5
(g1 g2 : ℝ → ℝ)
(hgim : ∀ x : ℝ, g1 x ≥ 1 ∧ g2 x ≥ 1)
(hgbd : ∃ B1 B2 : ℝ, ∀ x : ℝ, g1 x ≤ B1 ∧ g2 x ≤ B2)
: ∃ h1 h2 : ℝ → ℝ, ∀ x : ℝ, sSup {((g1 s)^x * (g2 s)) | s : ℝ} = sSup {(x * (h1 t) + h2 t) | t : ℝ} := by
  use fun x => 0, fun x => 0
  intro x
  have h1 : ∀ x : ℝ, sSup {((g1 s)^x * (g2 s)) | s : ℝ} = sSup {(x * (0 : ℝ) + 0) | t : ℝ} := by
    intro x
    have h2 : ∀ s : ℝ, (g1 s)^x * g2 s ≥ 1 * 1 := by
      intro s
      have h3 : g1 s ≥ 1 := (hgim s).1
      have h4 : g2 s ≥ 1 := (hgim s).2
      calc
        (g1 s)^x * g2 s ≥ 1^x * g2 s := by gcongr <;> simp_all
        _ ≥ 1 * g2 s := by simp
        _ ≥ 1 * 1 := by nlinarith
    have h5 : sSup {((g1 s)^x * (g2 s)) | s : ℝ} ≥ 1 := by
      apply csSup_le
      · use 1
        use 0
        simp_all
      · intro y hy
        obtain ⟨s, hs⟩ := hy
        simp_all
        <;> nlinarith
    have h6 : sSup {(x * (0 : ℝ) + 0) | t : ℝ} = 0 := by
      simp
      <;>
      nlinarith
    nlinarith
  simp_all

theorem putnam_2012_b5
(g1 g2 : ℝ → ℝ)
(hgim : ∀ x : ℝ, g1 x ≥ 1 ∧ g2 x ≥ 1)
(hgbd : ∃ B1 B2 : ℝ, ∀ x : ℝ, g1 x ≤ B1 ∧ g2 x ≤ B2)
: ∃ h1 h2 : ℝ → ℝ, ∀ x : ℝ, sSup {((g1 s)^x * (g2 s)) | s : ℝ} = sSup {(x * (h1 t) + h2 t) | t : ℝ} := by
  use fun x => 0, fun x => 0
  intro x
  have h1 : ∀ x : ℝ, sSup {((g1 s)^x * (g2 s)) | s : ℝ} = sSup {(x * (0 : ℝ) + 0) | t : ℝ} := by
    intro x
    have h2 : ∀ x : ℝ, sSup {((g1 s)^x * (g2 s)) | s : ℝ} = sSup {(x * (0 : ℝ) + 0) | t : ℝ} := by
      intro x
      have h3 : ∀ x : ℝ, sSup {((g1 s)^x * (g2 s)) | s : ℝ} = sSup {(x * (0 : ℝ) + 0) | t : ℝ} := by
        intro x
        have h4 : {((g1 s)^x * (g2 s)) | s : ℝ} = {((g1 s)^x * (g2 s)) | s : ℝ} := rfl
        have h5 : {(x * (0 : ℝ) + 0) | t : ℝ} = {(0 : ℝ)} := by
          ext y
          simp
          <;> constructor <;> intro h <;> simp_all
          <;> use 0 <;> simp_all
        rw [h4, h5]
        have h6 : sSup {((g1 s)^x * (g2 s)) | s : ℝ} = sSup {((g1 s)^x * (g2 s)) | s : ℝ} := rfl
        have h7 : sSup {(0 : ℝ)} = 0 := by
          simp [sSup_singleton]
        simp_all
        <;> aesop
      exact h3 x
    exact h2 x
  simp_all

-/
theorem putnam_2012_b5
(g1 g2 : ℝ → ℝ)
(hgim : ∀ x : ℝ, g1 x ≥ 1 ∧ g2 x ≥ 1)
(hgbd : ∃ B1 B2 : ℝ, ∀ x : ℝ, g1 x ≤ B1 ∧ g2 x ≤ B2)
: ∃ h1 h2 : ℝ → ℝ, ∀ x : ℝ, sSup {((g1 s)^x * (g2 s)) | s : ℝ} = sSup {(x * (h1 t) + h2 t) | t : ℝ} :=

```lean4
theorem putnam_2012_b5
(g1 g2 : ℝ → ℝ)
(hgim : ∀ x : ℝ, g1 x ≥ 1 ∧ g2 x ≥ 1)
(hgbd : ∃ B1 B2 : ℝ, ∀ x : ℝ, g1 x ≤ B1 ∧ g2 x ≤ B2)
: ∃ h1 h2 : ℝ → ℝ, ∀ x : ℝ, sSup {((g1 s)^x * (g2 s)) | s : ℝ} = sSup {(x * (h1 t) + h2 t) | t : ℝ} := by
  obtain ⟨B1, B2, hgbd⟩ := hgbd
  use fun x => 0, fun x => 0
  intro x
  have h1 : ∀ s : ℝ, (g1 s)^x * g2 s ≤ B1^x * B2 := by
    intro s
    have h1 := hgbd s
    have h2 := hgim s
    calc
      (g1 s)^x * g2 s ≤ B1^x * B2 := by
        gcongr
        <;> nlinarith [h2.1, h2.2, h1.1, h1.2]
  have h2 : sSup {((g1 s)^x * (g2 s)) | s : ℝ} ≤ B1^x * B2 := by
    apply csSup_le
    · use 0
      use 0
      simp
    · intro y hy
      rcases hy with ⟨s, rfl⟩
      exact h1 s
  have h3 : sSup {(x * (0 : ℝ) + 0 : ℝ) | t : ℝ} = 0 := by
    simp
  have h4 : sSup {(x * (0 : ℝ) + 0 : ℝ) | t : ℝ} ≤ sSup {((g1 s)^x * (g2 s)) | s : ℝ} := by
    simp_all [csSup_le]
  have h5 : sSup {((g1 s)^x * (g2 s)) | s : ℝ} ≤ sSup {(x * (0 : ℝ) + 0 : ℝ) | t : ℝ} := by
    simp_all [csSup_le]
  linarith
```
